title: Honey-Can-Do HNG-01338 Velvet Touch Shirt Hanger, Black, 3-Pack, Velvet Shirt/Dress Hanger
description: Honey-Can-Do HNG-01338 Velvet Touch Shirt Hanger, 3-Pack, Black. Beautiful, soft and durable this clothes hanger is contoured to keep shirts, dresses and jackets perfectly wrinkle-free. Features a 360 degree chrome, swivel rod hook to hang items easily on any closet rod, towel bar, or standard size door. Durable metal construction provides strength, reliability and long-lasting beauty. Black velvet coating is gentle on delicate garments and provides a non-slip surface that holds fabrics beautifully in place. Compact space saving design allows more use of available space in your closet. Home organization made easy.
